statements: UPDATE player_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Great game!' WHERE player_id = '1234'

UPDATE feedback SET feedback_text = 'Great job!' WHERE feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE reviews SET rating = 5, review_text = 'Excellent service' WHERE review_id = 3;
UPDATE feedback SET feedback_text = 'Updated feedback text', submission_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE feedback_id = 1;

UPDATE PlayerFeedback SET feedback_text = 'Great game, really enjoying it!' WHERE player_id = 123;
UPDATE GameReviews SET rating = 5, review_text = 'Highly recommended, excellent gameplay!' WHERE game_id = 456 AND review_id = 789;
UPDATE player_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Good job!' WHERE player_id = 123 AND feedback_id = 456;
UPDATE player_reviews SET rating = 5, review_text = 'Amazing game!' WHERE review_id = 789 AND player_id = 123;
UPDATE player_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Improved gameplay mechanics and graphics' WHERE player_id = 101 AND feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE player_reviews SET rating = 4, review_text = 'Great storyline and engaging gameplay' WHERE review_id = 10;
UPDATE Player SET player_name = 'John Doe' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE Developer SET headquarters = 'New York City' WHERE developer_id = 3;
UPDATE Player SET player_name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE Game SET release_date = '2022-04-15', game_title = 'New Game Title' WHERE game_id = 3;
